name: Fate Sealed
entries: You dash 30 feet forward pulling everything in your path and within your weaponâ€™s reach on either side. Each creature hit must make a dexterity saving throw, taking {@dice 5d8} force damage, or half as much on a fail. Those that fail are also left prone after being knocked into the air

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level slot or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for every slot above 5th.
